tv.generator-info-name: Original XML Generated with Tempest EPG Generator (made by Kvanc) - Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v0.9

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday as Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you an engaging mix of the latest news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics, global affairs, culture and weather. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Offsiders
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel Jessica Stewart, Adam Kingsley and Corbin Middlemas analyse the Brisbane Lions premiership win over Geelong in the AFL Grand Final, Rugby League Preliminary Finals and the first Bledisloe Cup Test.

programme.title: Compass
programme.desc: On Kangaroo Island, known to First Nations as the Island of the Dead, locals are reimagining funerals. As the islands first "death doula" begins her work with the terminally ill, the community foster their own death rituals.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.sub-title: Grow Anywhere: Small Space? No Problem!
programme.desc: Costa visits a balcony supplying more produce than most backyards, Jane explores a cleverly designed courtyard, Sophie gets expert tips on growing citrus in pots, and Josh discovers a hydroponic vegie garden in a driveway.

programme.title: Grand Designs New Zealand
programme.desc: Cindy Hall and her husband Jamin Halberstadt moved from the US to Dunedin in the 1990s. For their build, Cindy is influenced by the Mountain Modern architectural style shed seen in houses surrounding Lake Tahoe in Nevada.

programme.title: Anhs Brush With Fame
programme.desc: How do you paint a national icon? Thats the big question Anh Do has to ask himself as he attempts to create a portrait of Jimmy Barnes, easily Australias most successful rock artist.

programme.title: The Art Of Climate
programme.desc: Zoe Norton Lodge and Namila Benson want to know if art can help our climate. With OITNB star Yael Stone, artist Ghenoa Gela, sculptor Megan Copes living eco solution and artist Jessie Frenchs extraordinary "plastic".

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Teenage Boss: Next Level
programme.desc: A lover of surprises, Bens secret savings goal is put under pressure as he tries to keep little sister and mum on side.

programme.title: Prince Charles Inside The Duchy Of Cornwall
programme.desc: We examine the lifes work of Prince Charles as the longest serving Duke of Cornwall - referred to simply by his staff and tenants as the Boss.

programme.title: Hard Quiz
programme.desc: Tom Gleeson is hanging on to the Big Brass Mug until one Hard Quiz expert can prove they deserve it - but with which topic? Australian parrots, cricket bats, bones, or WikiLeaks?

programme.title: Australian Story
programme.desc: When Astrid Jorgensen started Pub Choir in a small Brisbane bar, she never imagined she would be filling halls across the world eight years later.

programme.title: Media Watch
programme.desc: Australias leading forum for media analysis and comment. Host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent, brings you a fearless critique of the weeks journalism.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the days events, explaining whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent
programme.desc: For Gazas one million children growing up isnt guaranteed. For almost two years more than 18,000 kids have been killed as Israel wages war to destroy Hamas. An intimate look at the toll the war is taking on Gazas littlest.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: This week on GGSP: We review the chaotic car carnage of the Destruction AllStars, and Rad goes on a journey to the edge of the Minecraft world to visit the fabled Far Lands!

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: When Grizz comes home with a live crab, he thinks it can become a pet for the brothers to share. However, after the crab pinches Ice Bears ear and wont let go.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: A friend of Marinettes gets akumatized into Truth. Using his power to force people to tell the truth, he wants to know Marinettes secret... and Ladybug and Cat Noirs, too!

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Cyborg and Beast Boy create clones of themselves to do their chores and the clones create more clones until the situation grows out of control.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Bitzers Dad comes to stay but he isnt too impressed the way his son and Shaun are running the flock.

programme.title: Abbott Elementary
programme.desc: When the students start participating in a new online trend that causes disruption to the school, the teachers band together to put an end to it.

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: High in the mountains a great horde gathers; Morgana prepares for war with a vengeful Mordred at her side. Merlin feels the weight of his destiny like never before as the ancient prophecies play out with terrifying accuracy.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Is Dr Xand finally allowed to eat in the lab or are the doughnuts for an experiment? Find out as the Doctors explore blood types and try to fight off unwanted invaders in game mode.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: When a hipster grocery store clerk shames the Bears for asking for plastic grocery bags, they realize that ecofriendly tote bags are their way of gaining acceptance among the progressive people of the Bay Area.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: A friend of Adriens gets akumatized into Lies. Able to make liars disappear, she is determined to rid the world of lies and those who tell them... including superheroes!

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: It is a peaceful night at the farm, until Shaun starts to walk in his sleep. The Flock cannot resist their natural instinct to follow, and chaos soon ensues.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze
programme.desc: The London Girls have self-belief, attitude and quick wits and theyll need all of that in their aim to conquer the Maze. Will Richard Ayoade be able to control the kamikaze bunch?

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: Gem celebrates all things Pokemon with special guest Harry! Plus, Screen Goblin drops his Pikachu diss track, games for when youve finally caught them all in Pokemon and another dating disaster in Finding Player 2!

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Regulars Sandi Toksvig and Alan Davies are joined by guests Romesh Ranganathan, Rachel Parris and Richard Osman to discuss Picnics.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Phils destination is Croydon, where he looks at properties on sale including a three bedroom end of terrace property and an extended and well presented three bedroom terraced house.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors look at your kidneys and reveal how these amazing cleaning machines work, the Ouch-Mobile is open for more intriguing medical mysteries and Dr Xand tries out some vision-shifting spectacles.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: The Nektons nemesis Alpheus Benthos breaks into the Aronnax to steal the Ephemychron and stop the Nektons from finding Lemuria forever! Ant is determined to get it back at all costs.

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: The Eureka is disabled by rogue asteroids but from the planet below the kids see new danger coming!

programme.title: Miraculous World: London, At The Edge Of Time
programme.desc: Marinette, now Chronobug, teams up with Bunnyx in order to defeat a mysterious opponent who travels through time...and knows about Ladybugs secret identity!

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.desc: Brian and Jon put a video game inspired myth to the test; is third person point of view an effective perspective for completing real life tasks? (Final)

programme.title: David Strattons Stories Of Australian Cinema
programme.desc: Part 2 celebrates the outsiders of Australian cinema: be it newcomers in Theyre A Weird Mob and Wake In Fright or locals out of step with the mainstream in Evil Angels, Muriels Wedding and Priscilla.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: An acquitted child molester comes into the ER with his wife, who was injured after someone tried to burn down their home. Neelas intern involves the hospital in a nasty lawsuit, and Brenner loses his cool with a patient.

programme.title: Rage New Music
programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: The unforgettable account of a family caught, with thousands of strangers, in one of the worst natural catastrophes of our time - the 2004 tsunami. But the terror is tempered by unexpected displays of compassion and courage.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors find out what happens when you eat with the help of a miniature Xand doll, test your ears and eyes in a baffling mind-bending trick, and join Dr Chris at work fighting infectious diseases.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: A Miraculous Conclusion! Farewell Goku! Until We Meet Again!
programme.desc: Goku and Jiren are at the end of their ropes as the clock winds down! Will the 7th Universe finally emerge victorious?!

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: Jet devises a bread-based duplicate of himself to take his place at a boring event - but the plan backfires.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
programme.sub-title: The Fault In Our Cutie Marks
programme.desc: The Crusaders encounter a problem that might be impossible for them to solve when an enthusiastic young griffin asks them to help her get a Cutie Mark of her own.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.sub-title: Batman V Teen Titans: Dark Injustice
programme.desc: The Titans try to outprank each other on April Fools Day.

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.sub-title: Exploding Toilet / Who Gest Wetter? / Ice Bullet
programme.desc: Will a toilet filled with bug spray explode? Which keeps you drier; running or walking in the rain? Plus the MythBusters test bullets made of ice that are thought to kill without leaving clues.

programme.title: Penn And Teller: Fool Us
programme.sub-title: The Penn and Teller 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Magicians include Young and Strange, Piff and Piero Venesia, and theres an amazing two-act trick by Penn and Teller.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: Upsy Daisy gives her special stone to Igglepiggle to look after whilst she rides the Ninky Nonk.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collector follows a mysterious sound all the way to a hot house. What can it be?

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Coco and Charlie are playing at Bings house when Coco spots the measuring lines on the wall that show how Bing has grown. Flop measures Bing and hes bigger than last time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is a cold and windy day. Peppa, George, Mummy and Daddy wear their hats, scarves and coats. At the park, it is so windy that Peppas ball blows into the pond and Georges hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Shaun is in serious trouble when the Farmer discovers hes the cake thief whos sabotaged his baked goods. When another farmer arrives and begins negotiations with the Farmer, Shaun fears the worst.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea freezes the Veggies so she can take over the whole supermarket. Chillis heat unfreezes Supertato, who then races on lolly-stick skis to thwart Evil Pea and save the day.

programme.title: Isadora Moon
programme.desc: Isadora learns that a tree which is home to a family of rabbits is being chopped down to make way for a zip-wire. Isadora decides to Save The Tree!

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.sub-title: An Ogre in Pitchfork Pines / An Ogre Wedding In Pitchfork Pines
programme.desc: Luigi reveals his true ogre self, teaching the Super Monsters to overcome prejudice. The kiddos use their superpowers to plan a magical wedding for Luigi and his fiance.

programme.title: Fizzy And Suds
programme.desc: Fizzy and Suds explore noodles! From pasta to pulled dough, they discover how noodles are made, cooked, and slurped in tasty dishes like stir-fries, soups, and colourful noodle bowls.

programme.title: Fireman Sam: Pontypandys Big Show
programme.desc: Its time for the Big Pontypandy Talent Show! But when Elvis knocks a drink over the drone control panel, the drones crash land, causing many fires.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: The Numberblocks play dominoes and try to reach the golden double-six domino.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends go on a school trip to visit a science museum. There are lots of fun activities including bubbly water, static balloons and Grampy Rabbits rocket ship.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Barnaby plays the baby in a game of family

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Today Pola, Tish and Bobby are decorating a cake for Rosa. Tish suggests it should be a Fish Cake with a chocolate truffle as its eye.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Vidas usually the vet, but when she twists an ankle, shes the patient and all of Sweetwood helps!

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley, Sophie and Benjamin make a Dino-Pirate float for the carnival.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.sub-title: An Yu And The Cave Stones
programme.desc: An Yu needs to find a magic stone in the city.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Frizzy sets sail around Boomerang Island in an effort to break Big Trevs record.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends: Big World! Big Adventures!
programme.desc: Thomas meets another big blue engine in Brazil that reminds him of Gordon.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit: The Tale Of The Missing Egg
programme.desc: When Jemimas new egg goes missing, only Peter Rabbit is able to put the clues together and find the culprit. But can he find the egg before it hatches, or has he finally met his match in the devious newcomer Samuel Whiskers?

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: When Millie accidentally loses Bens toy car - that once belonged to his grandpa - shes determined to get it back!

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: You can still have a green thumb if you dont have a garden. Tammy and Pia build their very own rainforest for the bathroom, which will thrive off all the moisture and steam to grow beautiful, oxygen rich ferns.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mandy Mouse has a birthday visit to a cheese theme park with Peppa and her friends. Everything in the park is cheese-themed - Mandy loves cheese!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: Tweak, Paani and Dashi work with a team of fire ants to engineer an escape route when the Paraguay river floods the ants home.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Mum are enjoying playing Keepy-Uppy around the house with their last balloon, when Dad joins in and the game becomes the ultimate test of skill.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet a family of fossa clambering in the trees. Then they go to see a leaf-tailed gecko, an animal that looks different but has the same skill as the fossa.

programme.title: Moon And Me
programme.desc: Dibillo decides to wear his favourite bow tie for the day. Mr Onion is very excited, and takes Dibillo around the house to show everybody how smart he looks.

programme.title: Beep And Mort
programme.desc: Beep and Mort come across a bird singing a beautiful song in the forest. They work with the villagers to create a gift for the bird so that the bird might gift them with its song once again.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: It seems everyone in Hoopla has a hula hoop, everyone except Zap. So Ziggy gives him a beginners model but Zap cant get his hoop to hula.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collectors house is trashed. But maybe Mole isnt the culprit this time.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing is getting ready to go to Sulas house but hes all sneezy and hot so Flop decides that Bing needs to stay home and keep his germs to himself.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle shows Peppa and her school friends how to make a time capsule. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule with Madame Gazelle many, many years ago. And now it is time to open it up.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: The Flock are delighted when a bird watcher drops his duck call in their field and Shaun uses it to entertain them. However, swallowing the duck call isnt what he had in mind - and the ducks arent too happy either.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Despite constant interruptions, Mandy tries to stay calm and earn her yoga badge - until disaster strikes and she needs to be rescued from a cliff ledge!

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly joins Ben and his family on an Elf trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when they realise that no one has remembered to pack lunch they ask Holly to use her magic to make some.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its finally the day of the babys arrival! Mummy and Daddy Pig rush to the hospital, but Peppa and George must stay with Granny and Grandpa Pig instead.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: The cadets host a do something new for you day on Kangaroo Beach in an effort to help support Pounce while he learns a tricky new skill.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: Drac and his Monster Pets help a mermaid embrace her uniqueness by learning to glide above water.

programme.title: Nikhil and Jay
programme.sub-title: Nikhil and Jay and the Messiest Mango
programme.desc: Jay dreams of being crowned the messiest mango eater ever, ever, ever, but Appa doesnt want drips on the clean floor. So Jay eats his mango in the bath!

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie, Nina and Akil are exploring musical instruments. Eddie learns how to play the xylophone by looking, touching, playing, and finally - enjoying making music in a band.

programme.title: Play School Science Time
programme.desc: What do you do when life gives you lemons? Make a DIY volcano of course! An episode exploding with fun, join Luke in the Science Time lab as he uses lemons and other ingredients to make an extra epic erupting volcano.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Caterina needs some help remembering the days of the week! Sing along to help her remember, and then the learning fun continues with a dance music remix of ABC.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Cheer for CH and shout for SH as they compete to see who is the champion. This episode introduces the letter teams CH and SH and the words shop, chop, chip, ship, shin, chin, shed, mash, cash and sash.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mandy Mouse has a birthday visit to a cheese theme park with Peppa and her friends. Everything in the park is cheese-themed - Mandy loves cheese!

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger and the baby Pea-Rexes go on an underwater adventure inside a rubbery bubble made by a young and friendly Watermelonsuchus, but things take a turn when the Bananaraptors get involved.

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Pola is pretending to be a horse for Bobby and Tish but just before its Tishs turn, Pola gets up saying he wants a rest.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley must keep Myrtles pumpkin safe from Speedy the snail.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Gekko tries to get Pirate Robot to be a chef instead of a pirate.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: The cadets host a do something new for you day on Kangaroo Beach in an effort to help support Pounce while he learns a tricky new skill.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends: Big World! Big Adventures!
programme.desc: Thomas finds a way to take part in the Brazilian carnival music.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Hannah and the junior gardeners celebrate her goats Gilly and Gerties birthday with a special fruity surprise a fruit cake made entirely out of fruit!

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: The Wiggles are a having a singing lesson today, singing a gentle song called Butterfly, Fly Butterfly, but Captain Feathersword is having trouble singing softly. Will Captain find his quiet voice?

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Flounder helps other chefs at an event.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but its Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: Stranded in an Australian swamp, Peso and Dashi help a flying fox mother and her pup survive the sweltering heat.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo dont want to tidy the playroom, so they get Daddy Robot to do it for them. But when Bluey takes things too far, Daddy Robot malfunctions with disastrous results.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Its time for a Squirrel Clubhouse Spring Clean. Duggee is dusting when the doorbell goes and a big package arrives for him. What is it? Duggee has bought an amazing new hoover, but yikes! Its very powerful.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato harnesses the power of his hiccups to save Tato Tower from Evil Peas jam attack.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in Dance Mode as payback. But the others cant resist taking Bingos turns for her.

programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight
programme.desc: The final word on the days top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australias most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Media Watch
programme.desc: Stand-up, stood down: ABC Americas axing of Jimmy Kimmel underscores how media giants are bowing to the new America. Plus a tourism reporter showcases the whale-watching industry on 7 News, but whos paying for the splash?

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: Landline
programme.desc: Imitating the effects of lightning to supercharge plant growth, and one mans mission to solve the power problems of a small Western Australian town.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight
programme.desc: The final word on the days top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australias most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: Landline: India
programme.desc: Not just on toast: A trade deal opens up new partnerships, providing Australian avocados to a new generation in India with a taste for new foods.

programme.title: BTN High
programme.desc: We break down Nepals Gen Z protests, and chat to a protester about their experiences.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: Start your morning with the latest headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories and the overnight news from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: ABC News Regional
programme.desc: The long-awaited autopsy about a death in custody in Alice Springs released by police, pensioners forced for forgo crucial medical treatments due to cost, plus families set up an organisation to look into missing persons.

programme.title: Insiders
programme.desc: David Speers is in London with David Crowe, Anna Henderson and Phil Coorey to discuss the week including the PMs trip to the UK and UN, recognising Palestinian statehood, climate targets, AUKUS, social media ban and Trump.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: ABC News With Auslan
programme.desc: The latest news and information from ABC News. This bulletin will be Auslan interpreted to provide accessible information to keep Australias deaf community connected and informed. Presented by Ruby Cornish.

programme.title: ABC Evening News
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australias best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: Meredith Sheehan brings you the latest headlines and a brief summary of the days top stories from ABC News.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and todays stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC Late News Weekend
programme.desc: When you need to know whats happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you todays events from reporters across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the days top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of whats happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Close Of Business
programme.desc: Inflation is down but prices are staying high, why economists say the RBAs next rate move could be up. Plus working smarter as Artificial Intelligence rewires the workforce - the winners and losers of the AI revolution.

programme.title: Landline
programme.desc: Moving and monitoring dairy cattle without fences; Non-tariff barriers costing farmers and exporters; An epic ride raising awareness about dementia; plus the beach-side sculpture festival with art from country Australia.

programme.title: Insiders
programme.desc: David Speers is in London with David Crowe, Anna Henderson and Phil Coorey to discuss the week including the PMs trip to the UK and UN, recognising Palestinian statehood, climate targets, AUKUS, social media ban and Trump.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: DW Focus On Europe
programme.desc: US President Trump has imposed 39% tariffs on Switzerland, dealing a serious blow to its economy. Plus no one has lived on Irelands Great Blasket island for 70 years, but now couples can be guardians for the summer.

programme.title: Tech Smart Agriculture
programme.desc: A Queensland avocado packhouse has turned to technology to find a solution to crippling rural labour shortages. Alex the robot, uses artificial intelligence to learn how to do its job better

programme.title: News Breakfast
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and Emma Rebellato bring you the latest news, overnight developments and top stories, joined by Catherine Murphy on sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you todays top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News through the day. We have reporters in more places, to cover whats happening and why it matters. Kathryn Robinson brings you the latest news and information.

programme.title: ABC News With Joe OBrien
programme.desc: Joe OBrien brings you a comprehensive summary of the days events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on whats going on.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe OBrien.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: The latest breaking news and a comprehensive roundup of the days best stories from across Australias states and regions. With reporters in more places ABC News tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time to stay in touch with whats happening in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Planet America
programme.desc: Get a head start on the week as Chas and John break down the latest from Trumps America, bringing their unique analysis and insightful interviews to the ABCs powerhouse Monday Night Lineup.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30s Political Editor Jacob Greber.
